document.masterDocTitle: Darwin wasps of the subfamily Pimplinae (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae) of Mexico: genera Apechthis Förster, Itoplectis Förster and Pimpla Fabricius

Pimpla caeruleata
Cresson 1874: 397
[ ♀ ♂ (ANSP), Mexico , Veracruz , Córdoba ].

subSubSection.paragraph:

Distribution. Mexico (Nuevo León, Tamaulipas, Querétaro, Veracruz, Oaxaca, Tabasco, Chiapas), Honduras, El Salvador, Nicaragua, Costa Rica.
First record from Honduras .
